references.paper_title: NeRF: Representing Scenes as Neural Radiance Fields for View Synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces NeRF, a fundamental technique for novel view synthesis that is frequently used as a basis for other 3D and 4D reconstruction methods.

references.paper_title: CAT3D: Create Anything in 3D with Multi-View Video Diffusion Models
references.reason: As the foundation upon which CAT4D is built, this paper introduces a multi-view latent diffusion model that applies 3D self-attention to image latents, enabling novel view synthesis and reconstruction in 3D.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian Splatting for Real-Time Radiance Field Rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces 3D Gaussian splatting, which is employed by CAT4D for efficient and robust reconstruction of dynamic scenes, improving speed and quality compared to previous approaches.

references.paper_title: Neural Scene Flow Fields for Space-Time View Synthesis of Dynamic Scenes
references.reason: This paper presents Neural Scene Flow Fields, which is relevant to CAT4D due to its handling of dynamic scenes and novel view synthesis; it's directly compared against.

references.paper_title: Shape-of-Motion: 4D Reconstruction from a Single Video
references.reason: This paper proposes Shape-of-Motion, a state-of-the-art 4D reconstruction method that utilizes large vision models to improve accuracy and is directly compared against in the results.
